body.name: NERMAK 12V 10Ah Lithium LiFePO4 Deep Cycle Battery, 2000+ Cycles Rechargeable Battery for Solar/Wind Power, Small UPS, Lighting, Power Wheels, Fish Finder and More, Built-in 10A BMS

features: 【Superior Performance】: Lithium iron phosphate battery has high energy density, Long cycle life, Good safety performance, No memory effect, etc. NERMAK LiFePO4 battery has built-in BMS protection to prevent overcharge, Over-discharge, Over-current and short circuit, and very low self-discharge rate. (Not motorcycle starter battery)
【Long Cycle Times】: Lithium batteries 2000 + cycles no problem while the traditional lead-acid batteries only 200-300 cycles, More safety and environmentally friendly than lead-acid batteries.

【Widely Uses】: Widely uses in most areas such as: Emergency Lighting (LED strip etc), 12V router, RV/outdoor camping, Small ups, kids ride on toy car, Power wheels, Fish finder, Kayak, Backup power, Ham Radio, Home Alarm, Cellular remote camera, Fire Security Systems, Solar/Wind power and more...

【Expansion and Recharge】Can be connected in series or parallel, in series, Up to 4 identical batteries can be connected，Quick charge by 6A , and heavy-duty output discharge up to 12A continuous and 3C Pulse.

【Warm Note】: 1* 12 Volt Replacement lithium ion battery，12 months warranty, If you have any question for our product, Contact us: click the "Ask a question" on our storefront or in "YOUR ORDER" options click the "contact seller" (please use LiFePo4 special charger, with fully automatic SLA charger may not be fully charged)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LiFePO4 battery is a cleaner, More powerful and safer power solution LiFeP04 batteries are maintenance-free batteries, If you need them all the time, Then lead-acid becomes too unreliable and laborious, The battery's lithium-ion properties reduce the weight of traditional lead-acid batteries to less than half, While significantly improving performance and capacity, Traditional lead-acid batteries contain large amounts of lead, After disposal if not properly disposed of, Will pollute the environment, While lithium materials without any toxic or hazardous substances, Recognized by the world as a green battery, Its great durability allows you to easily use them at home and at work, Or safe outdoor needs , The environment is most important.

Battery Specifications Battery type Lithium Ion Cycle life >2000 cycle Rated Capacity ‎10 Ah (0.2C, 25°C) Voltage ‎12.8 Volts Wattage 128 watts Weight 2.64 LB Terminal Type F2 Charging Voltage 14.6±0.2V Dimensions (L x W x H): 5.94 x 2.56 x 3.7 inches Continue Discharge Current 10A Peak discharge current 20A (Duration: less than 5 seconds) Operating Temperature Discharging: -4°F to 140°F; Charging: 32°F to 113°F Continue Charge Current 6A

APPLICATIONS Recommend using a professional LiFePO4 charger to charge the battery so that it can be charged to its full capacity (existing lead-acid battery chargers (wet, AGM or gel) will also work fine) Lithium ion batteries can be discharged up to 100% without causing damage. Make sure to charge the battery immediately after discharge. We recommend limiting the discharge to 80-90% depth of discharge (DOD) to avoid disconnection of the battery by the BMS. 12V LiFePO4 battery have no liquid inside. This allows you to safely mount the battery where you want to place it.

Rechargeable deep cycle maintenance-free LiFeP04 battery, Which is characterized by small size and light weight, Very suitable for fish finder, 10ah capacity can continue to provide a constant source of energy, So you can easily enjoy your fun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works in my CyberPower UPS
reviews.reviewText: The lead-acid batteries in my old 2015 CyberPower CP1500PFCLCD died. (I didn't find out until the power went out and I needed them! The UPS gave me no warning ahead of time.) I replaced them with these and it works just fine. And the UPS is now six pounds lighter! The only downside is that LiFePO4 has a different discharge curve than lead-acid, so the UPS doesn't really know what the charge on the batteries is. But they charge up completely, and I ran them down and got the full energy out.These should last much longer than lead-acid batteries do. That's why I bought these lithium batteries instead of cheaper replacement lead-acid batteries which are $45. These work, have about 10% more capacity, they're much lighter, and should last many years. I'm happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Customer Service and Reliable Battery!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased a battery from this seller, and while I initially encountered a problem with the product, their customer service team turned the situation around completely!Upon receiving the battery, I found that it had some faulty cells and a faulty Battery Management System (BMS). Naturally, I was disappointed, but I decided to reach out to their customer service team to see if they could help.To my surprise and delight, they responded promptly and with utmost professionalism. They apologized for the inconvenience and swiftly arranged a replacement. Not only did they send me a new battery, but they also used expedited shipping, ensuring I received it quickly.The new battery performs flawlessly, meeting all the specifications as advertised. I couldn't be happier with its performance, and it gives me peace of mind knowing that it's reliable and safe to use.I can't stress enough how much I appreciate the exceptional customer service provided by this seller. They turned a potentially negative experience into a positive one, and that level of dedication is hard to come by these days.In conclusion, I highly recommend this battery and this seller. Their products are of good quality, and their customer service goes above and beyond to ensure customer satisfaction.Thank you for the great experience!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the money
reviews.reviewText: We replaced my grandson's batteries on his RAZOR dirt bike with these lithium batteries and they work great. They last him about 2 days depending on how much he rides. Worth the money and would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nearly impossible to return defective items
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of these for a solar project and one of them quit charging in less than 60 days. Item is eligible for return but customer is responsible for return shipping. Have you ever tried to ship a 12v lithium battery? If it's any larger than a small battery USPS won't even take it and it's a logistical nightmare with the other shippers not to mention the expense. If you decide to but this item, be prepared to roll the dice on whether you get a good one or not. At $120 a pop I'm not ready to take that chance anymore***Update*** Seller contacted me and said they were arranging for a full refund of the purchase price of the defective battery abs that I did not need to return it. I've updated my review to 4 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight with Plenty of Power
reviews.reviewText: This battery works well for my Ghost Gate Opener that is attached to my estate gate. It has plenty of power for the gate to open and close multiple times throughout the day. It also charges well on my the solar panel that goes with the gate opener.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great battery - use for portable air compressor
reviews.reviewText: I use it with a Viair compressor for trailer tires. The compressor and the battery go in a tool bag so it is light and easy to move around. This particular compressor can draw up to 15 amps and the battery handles it with no problem. Also bought the 3 amp charger to revamp the battery. It fits in the bag, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars LiFePo4 replacement for a "Sealed" lead acid battery... leaks
reviews.reviewText: Bought a pair of these to replace some old SLA batteries in a UPS. The batteries in the UPS are oriented such that they live on their side in normal operation. I took the pair out of the box and charged them up with a benchtop power supply using the voltage and current specified in the product description (14.4v and 6A). When finished, one battery was fairly warm to the touch. I set them in the seat of my car to take them to the installation site, and they fell over. One remained warm for the duration of the ~50 minute drive and leaked some odd smelling fluid onto some of my mail and into my seat. The fluid melted the plastic window on an article of mail.Needless to say, a replacement for a "Sealed" Lead Acid battery should also be "Sealed". A battery purported to have an integrated BMS should also not seemingly overcharge itself to the point of physical failure.The standard Replacement/Refund process offered by Amazon for this item requires that it be shipped back, even if defective. I'm not about to take on the risk of committing a felony by knowingly shipping a battery leaking who knows what hazardous material through the mail system.I guess I could give one star for the *single* working battery out of the pair, but I'm not confident enough in the QC of these to risk letting them live on their side once installed. Very disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my needs
reviews.reviewText: I am a field technician and always on the road, I have have electronic devices in my car. I bought this to ensure I was not left stuck if I overtaxed the main battery. I has performed flawlessly and I do put a rather heavy demand on it.Highly recommended.Dave
